front.title: A URN Namespace for the Latvian National Government Integration Project

abstract.t: This document describes a Uniform Resource Name (URN) namespace that is engineered by a consortium (general contractor - Olimps Ltd and subcontractors - ABC software LTD, Microsoft Latvia LTD, RIX Technologies LTD and Microlink LTD) for naming information resources published and produced by the Latvian National Government Integration Project (latvian abbreviation - IVIS).
